knight.name: Knight
knight.description:
The quintessential knight, unmatched in melee combat. Armed with the most knightly weapon, the pollaxe, and equipped with plate armor, the knight is a force to be feared.

Recommended Proficiencies: Polearms, Brawling.

Difficulty: Very Easy

veteranknight.name: Lord
veteranknight.description:
The lord is a knight that has seen many battles, and has been able to afford a full suit of articulated Gothic Plate armor.

Recommended Proficiencies: Polearms, Brawling.

Difficulty: Very Easy

sellsword.name: Sellsword
sellsword.description:
The sellsword is a common mercenary. They are equipped with a longsword, and whatever armor they could afford at the time.

Recommended Proficiencies: Longswords, Brawling.

Difficulty: Medium

soldier.name: Soldier
soldier.description:
The soldier is a veteran of battlefields across the continent. Armed with a halberd, the soldier relies on their reach and striking power to eliminate enemies.

Recommended Proficiencies: Polearms, Swords, Brawling.

Difficulty: Easy

duelist.name: Duelist
duelist.description:
The duelist is a upper class citizen who lives for individual combat. Comes with civilian duelling weapons, such as the rapier.

Recommended Proficiencies: Swords, Brawling.

Difficulty: Hard

militia.name: Militia
militia.description:
The militia fighter is a quickly mobilized soldier, usually to defend their town or village. Carries a spear, and padded clothing.

Recommended Proficiencies: Polearms, Brawling.

Diffficulty: Hard

doppelsoldner.name: Doppelsoldner
doppelsoldner.description:
Doppelsoldner, meaning double pay men, are paid double because of their eagerness to take on suicidal missions. Armored with just a breastplate and a gigantic Zweihander, doppelsoldners have no fear in battle.

Diffficulty: Medium
